code: import React from"react";import"../../../styles/product-card.css";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{cartActions}from"../../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=props=>{const{id,title,image01,price,extraIngredients}=props.item;const dispatch=useDispatch();const addToCart=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.addItem({id,title,image01,price,extraIngredients}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product__item d-flex flex-column justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"product__img w-50",src:image01,alt:"Cake"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cakes/".concat(id),children:title})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"product__price mb-2",children:[" $ ",price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addTOCART__btn",onClick:addToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
